1.title: Cultures, nations, and religions are not rocks – they’re always changing
1.subtitle: Learn more about Destiny Instinct. Failing to understand it blinds us to the revolutionary transformations in societies happening all around us.

1.title: Sienna Sauce
1.subtitle: The award winning Sienna Sauce comes in 3 delicious flavors for every palette. Tangy (the original flavor), Lemon Pepper and Spicy. The Lemon Pepper and Spicy flavors are made with the original flavor being the base of those Sauces. Sienna Sauce has WOWed so many customers, the family based company had to create a subscription program so the Sienna Sauce addicts wouldn’t run out of their favorite sauces.

products.name: Sienna Sauce Variety Pack
products.description: This gourmet sauce has No High Fructose Corn Syrup and is Gluten-Free. It combines the perfect blend of sweet with a hint of tangy serving as a perfect complement to chicken, pork, beef, or seafood that has been fried, smoked, baked, or grilled.

products.name: Sienna Sauce 3 Pack
products.description: This gourmet sauce has No High Fructose Corn Syrup and is Gluten-Free. It combines the perfect blend of sweet with a hint of tangy serving as a perfect complement to chicken, pork, beef, or seafood that has been fried, smoked, baked, or grilled.

products.name: Digital Sauce Lovers E-Book
products.description: Sienna Sauce has released its first e-cookbook! This digital flavor manual has 4 amazing recipes by celebrity chef, Jabril Riddick, Along with the champion recipe from Sienna Sauce's Virtual Cook-Off.

2.title: Children's Books Starring Kids of Color
2.subtitle: Jambo Books is a children's book subscription company.  We send our members 2 or 3 books each month that feature a child of color as the star of a fiction story.
2.moreInfo:
Jambo Books serves children from birth to age 13. Our oldest members, ages 10-13, receive a middle grade novel and a nonfiction companion book that expands on a topic discussed in the novel. We focus on stories about children of color to delight your young readers and reaffirm your values of creating an inclusive and welcoming community.

Jambo means “Hello” in Swahili. Hello is an invitation to start a connection, to learn something new, to expand our notion of what it is to be human. Similarly, we invite our readers to build their own empathy muscles by reading about people who aren't exactly like themselves. Together, we affirm the humanity of every person.

2.title: BLK & Bold
2.subtitle: BLK & Bold welcomes the obligation to equip young people with tools to live their best lives and overcome familiar unfortunate circumstances by turning a daily ritual, enjoying a cup of coffee & tea, into a means of giving back. BLK & Bold pledges 5% of its profits to initiatives aligned to sustaining youth programming, enhancing workforce development, and eradicating youth homelessness.

products.name: La Guadalupe, Honduras - Single Origin (Direct Trade), Light Roast
products.description: As these beans are directly sourced from Finca La Guadalupe, this single origin will satisfy your desire for a creamy bodied light roast. With undertones of caramel and honey, this will become your everyday coffee.

products.name: Jasmine Loose Leaf Green Tea
products.description: Satisfy both smell and taste with this Jasmine Tea! Lightly smooth & sweet, it contains green tea leaves absorbed with fragrance from jasmine petals. This produces a cup that is very sensual with floral aromatics

products.name: BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hats
products.description: 2020 BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hat. Black/White/Yellow

3.title: McBride Sisters Winery
3.subtitle: Since 2005, The McBride Sisters’ mission has become clear—to transform the industry, lead by example, and cultivate community, one delcious glass of wine, at a time.

products.name: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Merlot
products.description: This juicy and sensational wine is a classic Merlot, sophisticated for the wine connoisseur and delicious for the wine novices.

products.name: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic NV New Zealand Sparkling Brut
products.description: Your new favorite sparkling wine. Pop the bubbly for any celebration or for the days you want to feel extra fancy. You deserve it.

products.name: SHE CAN 4-Pack Sampler
products.description: Yes SHE CAN have it all! Enjoy our most popular sampler including one of each flavor. Four cans is the equivalent of two bottles of wine and an amazing value for these delicious wines and spritzers.

3.title: Why Protests and Riots Work
3.subtitle: Riots are destructive, dangerous, and scary — but can lead to serious social reforms. To prevent more violent uprisings and protests, we need to take their causes seriously.

4.title: Robert Tanner Freeman - Bytes of History
4.subtitle: Robert Tanner Freeman was born in Washington DC in 1846. He was the son of slaves who had bought their freedom in the 19th century. Historical records are unclear but they probably adopted the surname Freeman in response to their transition.

4.title: The New Jim Crow
4.subtitle: The New Jim Crow is a stunning account of the rebirth of a caste-like system in the United States, one that has resulted in millions of African Americans locked behind bars and then relegated to a permanent second-class status—denied the very rights supposedly won in the Civil Rights Movement.

5.title: Seventh & Oak
5.subtitle: With self care as our inspiration and sustainability at the hearth of all our products, we craft every candle by hand and with a truckload of love from our home to yours in the hopes that they bring a little more warmth and coziness to your space.

products.name: Zen candle
products.description: When you light the Zen candle, think about how you feel when your space is consumed with good energy and positive thoughts. Burn the Zen candle when you want to cleanse your space to rid it of any negative energy and bring in all the good vibes.

products.name: Namaste candle
products.description: Relaxing lavender beautifully balanced with sweet ylang ylang and grassy vetiver in a recyclable glass jar. Enjoy some time in bed with a good book (or a Netflix show - who's judging?) before heading to bed for your beauty sleep. Just remember to blow it out before drifting off to dreamland.

products.name: Serenity candle
products.description: Fruity but not overpowering; very bright and fresh as each note distinguishes itself. Light up Serenity when you want to freshen up your entryways, kitchens and bathrooms.

5.title: 13th Amendment
5.subtitle: The 13th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution, ratified in 1865 in the aftermath of the Civil War, abolished slavery in the United States.

6.title: Dr. Ernest Everett Just
6.subtitle: Dr. Ernest Just was a pioneering African American biologist, academic and science writer. Just's primary legacy is his recognition of the fundamental role of the cell surface in the development of organisms.

6.title: Racist abuse directed at England players after Euro 2020 final
6.subtitle: The online racial abuse of some England players following Sunday's Euro 2020 final defeat by Italy has been described by the team's manager Gareth Southgate as "unforgivable" and "just not what we stand for." Marcus Rashford, Jadon Sancho and Bukayo Saka were targeted on social media after they missed penalties in the 3-2 shootout defeat at Wembley Stadium.

7.title: Darlyng & Co.
7.subtitle: The mission of Darlyng & Co. is to give parents one less thing to worry about when it comes to caring for their baby. We always have parents in mind in the design process and are proud to present products that are functional, toxin-free, sourced from high-quality materials, and aesthetically pleasing.

products.name: Kids Hair Care Kits
products.description: Try our kid-friendly haircare kits curated for your Darlyng to grow and maintain healthy hair.

products.name: Muslin Newborn Swaddle Blanket
products.description: These soft cuddly blankets can be used in a variety of ways like a car seat cover, nursing, playtime, tummy time, stroller rides, receiving blanket and more.

products.name: Teether Plush Sensory Toy- Glow in the dark
products.description: Yummy Buddy is designed to engage vision, auditory and fine motor skills from infant to toddler and beyond. Bright, contrasting patterns will fascinate baby as eyesight develops, and they can discover new sounds, colors, and textures before. There’s a multi-purpose clip designed for strollers or diaper bags so it can travel with you. Exploring role play fun at home and on the go. Yummy Buddy has crinkly ears, both chewable "glow" silicone hands, teething bib, multiple colors, and chimes when shaken, too! The perfect sensory chew toy.

7.title: Justice for Jacob Blake
7.subtitle: Jacob Blake is a loving father of 6 that deserves proper medical attention and legal representation. The funds raised through this Gofundme will go toward Jacob’s medical bills, family expenses, legal representation, support for his children and therapy costs.

8.title: #ChooseToChallenge - International Women's Day
8.subtitle: A challenged world is an alert world. Individually, we're all responsible for our own thoughts and actions - all day, every day. We can all choose to challenge and call out gender bias and inequality. We can all choose to seek out and celebrate women's achievements. Collectively, we can all help create an inclusive world. From challenge comes change, so let's all choose to challenge.

8.title: CarmaBella Skincare
8.subtitle: CarmaBella Skincare is made for women who want the best skincare, without any artificial chemicals or unnecessary ingredients. When using our products, you don't have to choose between natural and luxurious.

products.name: Brightening Turmeric Clay Mask
products.description: Want an instant glow? We have the perfect natural skincare product to help you achieve it. The Brightening Turmeric Clay Mask instantly brightens dull, tired skin and restores your skins healthy complexion over time.

products.name: HydroSurge Moisturizing Gel
products.description: The HydroSurge Moisturizing Gel replenishes water and helps to improve your skin's moisture barrier, resulting in smooth, hydrated skin. This addictively refreshing gel leaves skin plump, dewy, and glowing.

products.name: The Essential Bath & Body Set
products.description: The Essential Bath & Body Set is a nourishing collection that will leave your skin feeling soft and moisturized all day. This set includes the Natural Sugar Based Body Wash, a bath puff, and the Nourishing Shea Body Lotion.

9.title: Microaggressions Matter
9.subtitle: They may not always be ill-intentioned, but the slights illuminate deeper problems in America.

9.title: Iltopia Studios
9.subtitle: Iltopia Studios is a small creative studio based in Portland, Oregon. Our objective is simple: make comics and cartoons that open doors to more understanding. Iltopia Studios is dedicated to producing engaging content to our customers at a high quality and a variety of price points. Founded by creator Steven Christian. His goal is to create quirky adventure stories about the Black experience in America that entertains, empowers, and educates. We make cartoons and comics with emerging technology to provide unique and immersive storytelling experiences.

products.name: Cutie Catcher Pack #1
products.description: This Sticker Pack is collections handcrafted stickers by artist Steven Christian. The designs are based on cartoon and comic Eyelnd Feevr.  All sticker are 4” tall, hand cut, and hand laminated. They are great for placing on laptops, skateboards, water bottles, etc. With all the available designs, there is no limit to where you can place them!

products.name: Black Superheroes Matter Artbook
products.description: Black Superheroes Matter Artbook is the original illustration series by Steven Christian aimed at redefining popular superheroes through the eyes of black children. The book includes 110 full color illustrations ranging from anime to Power Rangers. This quirky collection of illustrations is guaranteed to empower and inspire you to redefine you own heroes in your image. Each book is handmade, numbered, and signed by artist Steven Christian.

products.name: Eyelnd Feevr Season 1: Big City, Small Dreemz
products.description: Big City, Small Dreemz is the first Season in the Eyelnd Feevr Webseries. It introduces us to Roscoe Thomason an intelligent, precocious and rebellious 9-year-old. He explores one of his wildest dreams with his best friend Thomas "T.J." Jenkins. As they try to find the true meaning, one must wonder if this is figment of Roscoe's wild imagination or a foreshadowing of what is to come.

10.title: Official Black Wall Street
10.subtitle: Get thousands of Black-owned businesses at your fingertips with the largest online platform for Black businesses.

10.title: Brown v. Board: Timeline of School Integration in the U.S.
10.subtitle: Trace school integration from 1849 to 2007.

11.title: Classify White Supremacist Groups as Domestic Terrorist Organizations
11.subtitle: Request a new legal requirement to register, classify, and subsequently surveil white supremacist organizations as domestic terrorist organizations. By classifying these groups as intimidating to the American population and dangerous to human life, the institutions responsible for protecting citizens against such groups will have the necessary information and resources to prevent further destruction carried out by these violent terrorist groups.

11.title: Sugarfoots
11.subtitle: Sugarfoots anchor product is a renowned child-safe, hand-crafted multi-ethnic rag doll, complemented by a children’s book series based on folktales from cultures around the world. Our mission is sustained by a performing arts summer camp for youth that sets the pace among competitors, inspiriting the imagination through creative storytelling, song and dance.

products.name: Cinnamon
products.description: One of Sugarfoots' signature rag dolls. Colors and fabrics will vary with handcrafted items.

products.name: Boy Dolls
products.description: One of Sugarfoots' signature rag dolls. Colors and fabrics will vary with handcrafted items.

products.name: Black Lives Matter Sugarfoots Bistro 16oz Mugs
products.description: What better way to show solidarity with Cocoa, Ginger and Cinnamon Black Lives Matter Sugarfoots Bistro Mugs!

12.title: 10 killed in "racially motivated" mass shooting at Buffalo supermarket
12.subtitle: Police said the shooter has been charged with murder in what officials are calling a hate crime and a case of racially motivated violent extremism.

12.title: Knock Your Socks Off
12.subtitle: Created from an appreciation for high-quality socks that make a lasting impression and backed by years of retail buying experience, Knock Your Socks Off (aka KYSO) was founded in 2016 in Toronto, Canada.

products.name: Above the Clouds Women's Ankle Socks
products.description: Ultra soft fabric, made from a blend of 80% combed cotton. Fits just above the ankle. Fits Women's shoe size 6-11

products.name: Basketball Cotton Socks
products.description: Ultra soft fabric, made from a blend of 80% combed cotton. Fits mid-calf length. Fits US men shoe size 7-12

products.name: Cherry Dress Socks
products.description: Sweet, sweet cherries! Made from a blend of combed cotton, spandex and elastin. Fits men's shoe size 9-12 and women's shoe size 7-10

13.title: How to overcome our biases? Walk boldly toward them
13.subtitle: Our biases can be dangerous, even deadly — as we've seen in the cases of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Missouri, and Eric Garner, in Staten Island, New York. Diversity advocate Vernā Myers looks closely at some of the subconscious attitudes we hold toward out-groups. She makes a plea to all people: Acknowledge your biases.

13.title: A.O. Hamer
13.subtitle:
Hey, I'm Aramis and I love color!

My acrylic paintings are inspired by divine femininity, music, higher consciousness, and the cosmos. Liberation is my life's work- to free myself from the chains that could hold me back mentally, physically, and spiritually. My paintbrush reminds me of the creative power I have within the canvas - and life. As I take this journey to freedom, I hope to inspire others along the way.

14.title: Color blind or color brave?
14.subtitle: The subject of race can be very touchy. As finance executive Mellody Hobson says, it's a "conversational third rail." But, she says, that's exactly why we need to start talking about it. In this engaging, persuasive talk, Hobson makes the case that speaking openly about race — and particularly about diversity in hiring — makes for better businesses and a better society.

14.title: Why Many Americans Can’t See The Wealth Gap Between White And Black America
14.subtitle: In the last year and a quarter, the pandemic has served as a stark reminder of just how unequal America still is. But it also hasn’t been a “reminder” for everyone. Black Americans and other Americans of color didn’t have the luxury of forgetting that American society is unequal.

15.title: Beauty Bakerie
15.subtitle: A single mother and breast cancer survivor, Cashmere Nicole founded Beauty Bakerie in 2011 as a new lipstick brand that was vegan, non-toxic and cruelty-free.

products.name: Chocolate Therapy Sugar Sticks
products.description: A castor oil infused lip liner collection that delivers high-quality custom coverage while lining & defining your lip look. Just add 1/2 cup of sugar and everything will be pretty sweet!

products.name: Eyelash Icing Waterproof Mascara
products.description: Enter the Beauty Bakerie freezer and start ice-ing with our NEW waterproof and volumizing Eyelash Icing Mascara. The perfect topper for your baked beat, Eyelash Icing Mascara will freeze your lashes in place for all-day, all-night long-lasting wear.

products.name: Blending Egg Beauty Sponges
products.description: Cooked up with you in mind, Blending Egg Beauty Sponges were uniquely created to fit in the palm of your hand for seamless blending. Try a recipe with a dash or two of Cake Face Concealer and bake until your heart's content with Flour Setting Powder. Blending Eggs will be your new favorite tool for eggs-traordinary cakin' that's hard to beat! Hehe.

15.title: Inn8 Apparel
15.subtitle: Your mind. Your body. Your individuality. Your imperfections. These are the things you are born with. They are innate. Embrace them. They are yours. Celebrate them. They are yours. Love them. They are you.

products.name: "Beholder" Embroidered Unisex Hoodie
products.description: Embroidered hoodies are custom made to order and will take approximately 2-3 weeks to receive apparel.  Crafted for comfort, this lighter weight sweatshirt is perfect for relaxing. Once put on, it will be impossible to take off.

products.name: "Human" Unisex T-Shirt
products.description: This heavy cotton tee has the classic cotton look and feel. Casual elegance will make it an instant favorite in everyone's wardrobe.

products.name: "A Soul Lost in Time" Premium Matte Vertcial Posters
products.description: Every room deserves to be special. These supreme quality print posters in various sizes serve as statement pieces, creating a personalized environment.

16.title: 15th Amendment
16.subtitle: The 15th Amendment granting African-American men the right to vote was adopted into the U.S. Constitution in 1870.

16.title: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.
16.subtitle: We carry grooming products that are primarily geared towards the bearded community, but we also have women and children using them as well. Our oil, balm, and butter are excellent for the hair on your head, and the butter can also double as a lotion.

products.name: Tanzanian Sun Premium Beard Butter
products.description: Black Beard Brigade's beard butter is designed to feel more natural and less oily than others on the market. It is made from 100% natural ingredients that promote a fuller & thicker beard. Soothes and replenishes dry, damaged hair with natural lipid-rich botanicals. Adds the finishing touches for beard renewal and restoration.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

products.name: Premium Classic Beard Oil
products.description: Black Beard Brigade's beard oil is designed to tone, nourish, and clear the skin underneath the beard. It feels more natural and less oily than others on the market. It is made from 100% natural ingredients that promote a fuller & thicker beard.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

products.name: GL Long Sleeve Shirts
products.description: This well-loved favorite features a classic crew neck, long sleeves, and superior combed and ring-spun jersey cotton. Solid colors are made from 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 single 4.2 oz, while Athletic Heather is made from 90% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton and 10% poly blend.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

17.title: Here Are the 18 African-American Astronauts
17.subtitle: It was 22 years after Alan Shepard’s first space trip that the U.S. sent a person of color up.

17.title: Charge the cops who shot Jacob Blake
17.subtitle: Jacob Blake, 29, was shot by Kenosha, Wisconsin police officers in the back 7 times on August 23, 2020. Officers were on the scene due to a fight, which Jacob Blake was trying to break up. The cops who shot him need to be charged.

18.title: Oprah Winfrey's Cecil B. DeMille Award Acceptance Speech - 2018 Golden Globe Awards
18.subtitle: Watch Oprah Winfrey's 2018 Golden Globe Awards acceptance speech for the Cecil B. DeMille Award.

18.title: The symbols of systemic racism — and how to take away their power
18.subtitle: Multidisciplinary artist and TED Fellow Paul Rucker is unstitching the legacy of systemic racism in the United States. A collector of artifacts connected to the history of slavery — from branding irons and shackles to postcards depicting lynchings — Rucker couldn't find an undamaged Ku Klux Klan robe for his collection, so he began making his own.

19.title: Corner 103
19.subtitle: Corner 103 has a reputation for making world class wines, and is committed to exceeding expectations.

products.name: NV Sparkling Rosé
products.description: This Gold Medal winning wine was made in the classic French style using traditional grapes; making it non-vintage; and using the methode champenoise process which requires a secondary fermentation in the bottle.

products.name: 2018 Chardonnay, Sonoma Carneros
products.description: Our 2018 Chardonnay was crafted from a low-yielding vineyard in the Carneros AVA that consistently produces some of the region's best Chardonnay grapes.

products.name: 2017 Grenache, Alexander Valley
products.description: Our 2017 Grenache is a balanced wine crafted from an amazing low yielding vineyard in the Alexander Valley that consistently delivers excellent fruit flavors and silky tannins.

19.title: VZN Clothing
19.subtitle: Our clothing is made to motivate you to visualize your goals and remain persistent through adversity. Vision is not simply seeing with the eyes, but rather creating a positive image and experience for your future success with your mind. By following your vision with action and remaining persistent through adversity, we believe anything is possible.

products.name: Spread Love, Not Germs Heart Mask
products.description: Black mask with red and white embroidery

products.name: Tre Balloon Series 1.0 Tee
products.description: For the Tre Series, we follow the boy, Tre, on his path of following his dreams. The purpose of Tre being lifted by the balloons while holding the basketball is to inspire people to work towards their goals with the confidence of a child who is following their dreams.

products.name: Memory Lane Poster Print
products.description: 8 x 11 in 80 lb paper Oil painting print with a matte finish

20.title: The Costs of Racism to White People
20.subtitle: We tend to think of racism as a problem for people of color and something we should be concerned about for their sake. However, the costs of racism to white people are devastating, especially to those of us without the money and power to buffer their effects.

20.title: Seeing White Podcast Series
20.subtitle: Just what is going on with white people? Police shootings of unarmed African Americans. Acts of domestic terrorism by white supremacists. The renewed embrace of raw, undisguised white-identity politics. Unending racial inequity in schools, housing, criminal justice, and hiring. Some of this feels new, but in truth it’s an old story.

21.title: Support the King Center
21.subtitle: The King Center remain committed to proactively educating and training individuals and leaders across all sectors in Nonviolence365 to influence equitable change in our national and global infrastructure.

21.title: Coral Oral
21.subtitle: Not only are these toothbrushes more aesthetically pleasing, you differentiate each brush by its pattern and not by its color. Our company is proudly black owned and highlights oral health facts including a Black history fact that we all should know!

products.name: Medium 4-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Soft Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Soft bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Medium Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

22.title: KAZMALEJE
22.subtitle: At KAZMALEJE (pronounced cosmology), we are dedicated to creating innovative, lifestyle-amplifying tools and accessories to improve our customers' hair care and beauty regimens.

products.name: KurlsPlus Paddle Comb
products.description: Our KurlsPlus Paddle Comb is great for detangling all hair types, lengths and thickness. It is the ultimate power tool that will allow you to detangle, blow dry, massage and style all in ONE!

products.name: KurlsPlus Pick
products.description: Our KurlsPlus Pick is great for short cuts or adding volume after a braid out, twist out or roller set. It's the ideal styling companion for travelers or on-the-go curlistas who need to refresh their hair throughout the day.

products.name: KurlsPlus Comb
products.description: Meet our KurlsPlus Comb. Our Comb is great for detangling hair of all lengths that is normal to thick in density with minimal stress on your hair whether wet or dry. It's also great for raking through heat styled curls to create a feathered look or detangling wigs/extensions without disrupting the curl pattern too much resulting in unwanted frizz.

22.title: Color of Change
22.subtitle: Color Of Change was founded in moments just like this one. As Black communities reeled in grief as all levels of government failed to protect Black people in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, we recognized that not enough of the people and institutions with power over our lives had any fear of disappointing Black people. For the last 15 years, we've focused on building that power.

23.title: When the Negro Leagues Played Through the Great Depression and WWII
23.subtitle: The Negro Leagues struggled financially amid systemic racism and segregation—even before the Great Depression disproportionately devastated Black America. But the game's finest days—with transcendent stars like Satchel Paige and Josh Gibson—still lay ahead.

23.title: Bessie Smith, The Empress of the Blues
23.subtitle: She was big and brown and built high off the ground — "a hell of a woman," men called her, but most women said she was "rough." And while there were other blues singers in the first half of the 20th century — some who shared her surname — none could be mistaken for Bessie Smith.

24.title: Amanda Gorman Inauguration Poem
24.subtitle: Watch and read the youngest poet laureate, Amanda Gorman, recite her poem "The Hill We Climb"

24.title: NSPRE Electronics
24.subtitle: The NSPRE™ brand is built on and strives for creativity and culture. We create exciting, lifestyle, and innovative products that inspire everyday use. Our vision is to "Inspire the culture through social technology" to improve others' lifestyles and the way we access the world around us.

products.name: Lynx Bluetooth® Sunglasses
products.description: No earplugs or ear coverings. Open concept sound with privacy. Designed with Ultra Modern materials and a lightweight frame design. Connects to any mobile device with Bluetooth® ability.

products.name: NX Pro Plus LE (128G)
products.description: The (Limited Edition) NSPRE™ NX Pro Plus Cotton Candy is an extension of the original NX Pro. It is 6.5 Inches, has a much slimmer frame of 8.0mm, and 3D curved glass back finish.

products.name: NSPRE™ MicroSDHC - 128GB
products.description: Record and transfer videos, photos, music, files and more from Micro SD enabled host devices such as Android smartphones and tablets, action and surveillance cameras, drones, computers and more.

25.title: MLK: The Other America
25.subtitle: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.’s 1967 speech at Stanford. Here, he expounds on his nonviolent philosophy and methodology.

25.title: The Other Wes Moore
25.subtitle: Two kids named Wes Moore were born blocks apart within a year of each other. Both grew up fatherless in similar Baltimore neighborhoods and had difficult childhoods; both hung out on street corners with their crews; both ran into trouble with the police. How, then, did one grow up to be a Rhodes Scholar, decorated veteran, White House Fellow, and business leader, while the other ended up a convicted murderer serving a life sentence?

26.title: YTPshop - African Clothing
26.subtitle: All YTPshop products are crafted by women in Nigeria and the fabrics are carefully sourced from West African markets. YTPshop products are made with high-quality material, cutting edge tailoring, vibrant colors, and are affordably priced.

26.title: QuintesScential Candles
26.subtitle: Since we love burning scented candles, we decided to embark on our journey of becoming Black chandlers. We decided, from the beginning, to use only the healthiest ingredients in anything that we make and sell.

products.name: Earthy
products.description: Earthy is a sensual fragrance that lives up to its name. Our Earthy is aromatic, woodsy, and intoxicating, with a prominent sandalwood base, complemented by layers of sage, spice, and amber.

products.name: Sweet Dreams
products.description: Ready for bed? Time to unwind from a hectic day? Escape with gentle notes of lavender on your pillow with the crisp scent of freshly washed linen.

products.name: Pleasantry
products.description: Our Pleasantry is a proven pleaser, combining a patented odor neutralizing technology with a crisp, clean fragrance that brings to mind fresh linens drying on the line. Pleasantry doesn't just cover up unwanted smells, it cancels them out.

27.title: The Collective PAC
27.subtitle: The Collective is strengthening our democracy by addressing the significant underrepresentation of the Black community in public office. We are fighting for equal representation and protection under the law so it is vital that we have Black candidates run, and Black voices heard.

27.title: Understanding My Privilege
27.subtitle: University Chancellor, Susan E. Borrego, reflects on her life as an emancipated minor and dissects the emotionally charged conversation surrounding race relations in the United States. This raconteur uses her powerful first-person account of "White Privilege" and "Black Lives Matter" to underscore the responsibility each one of us has to bring about change.

28.title: Walking While Black
28.subtitle: Garnette Cadogan on the Realities of Being Black in America

28.title: Namascents Candle Co
28.subtitle: Namascents Candle Co crafts candles and home fragrance products for any space; welcoming peace, stillness and good thoughts. Our inspiration is nature, love + memories. We keep it clean + simple with a scentful twist.

29.title: Learn about Julius Jones
29.subtitle: Listen to the Jason Flom & Kim Kardashian West talk about Julius Jones’ story.

29.title: Afro Flow Yoga
29.subtitle:
With over 14 years of experience, Leslie Salmon Jones continues to pursue an active interdisciplinary career in health and dance in Boston and New York City. A Toronto native, Leslie received her B.A. in Dance and Health Studies at the State University of New York, and her Fitness Instructors Certification at New York University. She was a scholarship recipient at the esteemed Alvin Ailey Dance Theatre in New York City as well as the London Contemporary Dance School.

As a professional dancer, Leslie worked with known greats such as Judith Jameson, Bill T. Jones and Wynton Marsalis. At her studio in New York, she developed her own exercise program based on various techniques honed through working with her personal training clientele on a daily basis. Today she continues to divide her time between New York City and Boston.

Leslie has extensive experience in the fitness industry, including being a consultant for the New York Knicks healthy lifestyle clinic that teaches self-esteem to youth. She also served as a board member for the organization, Free Arts for Abused Kids, NYC. Today, she serves as a board member of the United Nations Association of New York

30.title: Pod For The Cause Podcast
30.subtitle: The Leadership Conference on Civil and Human Rights launched "Pod for the Cause" to expand the conversation on the critical civil and human rights challenges of our day. Through this expanded dialogue, we want to spur activism that drives change in our communities and country.

30.title: Stay Informed: Ma'Khia Bryant Shooting
30.subtitle: A teenage girl who the police say threatened two girls with a knife was fatally shot by an officer in Columbus, Ohio, on Tuesday, April 20th, 2021, shortly before a jury reached a guilty verdict in the murder trial of the former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin in last year’s killing of George Floyd.

31.title: Kultured Misfits
31.subtitle: Kultured Misfits is a lifestyle, sport and ready-to-wear brand based out of Atlanta, Georgia. With a heavy influence from culture found in music, film, and art, we are driven to create timeless work by portraying an aesthetic that is uniquely our own to impact our everyday life.

products.name: Kultured Misfits Tracksuit (Crew + Joggers)
products.description: Classic Kultured Misfits tracksuIt set with matching crewneck and jogger pants in black. A comfortable cotton mix jogger, featuring embroidered Kultured Misfits logo on the left chest and thigh. Drawstring waist and cuffed hems.

products.name: Legalize Free College (Do Tha Right Thang) T-Shirt
products.description: Every sale of a Legalize Free College product will contribute to the "Legalize Free College Scholarship"!

products.name: MISFIT Embossed Crewneck
products.description: Premium crewneck is cut from French terry jersey. With the embossed cursive logo adds a signature finishing touch to its classic design.

31.title: 57 Chocolate
31.subtitle: 57 is the pioneer bean to bar chocolate business in Ghana. ’57 Chocolate is short for 1957, which is the year of Ghana’s independence. This venture uses resources grown within the country to create delicious treats.

products.name: Chocolate Chips
products.description: Get them in dark chocolate (71.5%) or milk chocolate (49%)

products.name: Adinkra Bars
products.description: Our Adinkra bars are beautiful bite-sized bars engraved with visual symbols originally created by the Ashanti of Ghana. A minimum of 2 chocolates and a maximum of 6 fit in our adinkra boxes. They are perfect for a quick treat and come in dark, milk, white, mocha latte, bissap, and moringa.

products.name: Chocolate Gift Box
products.description: Get a set of 6 or 12 bars to give as a gift to the chocolate-lover in your life.
